statement.p: Compute \displaystyle\int_{{S}}{\left({3}\vec{{{i}}}+{6}\vec{{{k}}}\right)}\cdot{d}\vec{{{A}}} where \displaystyle{S} is a square of side length \displaystyle{6} perpendicular to the \displaystyle{z}-axis centered at \displaystyle{\left({0},{0},-{5}\right)} oriented away from the origin.
